I've ordered other items from this designer before and they fit well and look nice. That being said, I had to return this vest because the darting in the chest was in a weird spot and the seams on the chest were awkward and lumpy. There was a lot of gapping at the side of the breasts/under the arms. Maybe on a bustier woman, this might not have been a problem. For reference; I am 34c and got a medium, which was the recommended size according to the chart.

I really like the 3 colors I ordered, the weave pattern and the fact that it's fully lined. Sadly, the XL was too big for my 5'9'', 180 lbs. pear-shaped frame. I wanted it to be more fitted over my button-down blouses to accentuate my slender waist. I decided to reorder it in the next size down. I'm pretty long waisted, so I was hoping it would be long enough in the L size. I think in the 3 colors I like, the vests will be fun layering pieces to add to my wardrobe, that is if the L fits correctly. I have lots of tops and blouses they I think will work great with. I'm going to change the buttons to black, but I'm pretty sure I have some on hand. UPDATE: after trying on the large (a size down from what I first ordered) it fit nicely, except the design was too short and the neckline too deep for my preference. I decided to return both sizes in all 3 colors. Besides the fit, none of the colors looked good with my skintone. Lastly, as 100% polyester, it wasn't very insulative. It's cold in cold weather and hot in warmer weather. I really wanted a classic style vest as a warm laying piece for the cold months, almost half the year here in SE Idaho. That's not what this vest design gave me, which was disappointing because I like the classic style.

I don’t want to sit in a chair and have to suck-in my stomach to prevent a bulging truffle shuffle belly pushing buttons apart. I’m going to keep it as I’m trying to lose some weight, but a little bummed I have to wait to wear it comfortably (I don’t want to deal with the hassle to return. such a pain to have to box it, print label, find location to drop. The vest has no stretch to the fabric. Although the size medium fitting is almost perfect with the cincher strap (38 chest/30 waist, 130 lbs, size 5), the sewing is irregular and lumpy. Just barely filled out the top of the Medium with 34H, so can handle larger on top and lots of extra room at waist. A smaller size could work if the fabric stretched, but not the case. It has cute working pockets ok for cash and small items. I'm returning due to discomfort of material (which is decent quality for other purposes) and it would need constant readjusting with movement. For the price it could be more wearable.
